snippet: Ydanis Rodriguez, a City Council member from northern Manhattan, has asked for permission to donate a $5,000 stipend to the Occupy Wall Street movement.
abstract: Ydanis Rodriguez, a City Council member from northern Manhattan, has asked for permission to donate a $5,000 stipend to the Occupy Wall Street movement.
lead_paragraph: Several members of the New York City Council have embraced the cause of Occupy Wall Street, praising the movement, joining its marches and, in some cases, getting arrested alongside the demonstrators. Now one councilman wants to lavish something else on it: money.

headline.main: Councilman Seeks to Donate Stipend to Occupy Wall Street
